name: drizzle-neon
description: This repository serves as a Node.js TypeScript project that utilizes drizzle for managing neon database tables.

scripts.DB:createNewMigration: npx tsc --noEmit && gulp DB:checkSchemaAndRefreshTestDataFiles && rimraf migrations && npx drizzle-kit introspect:pg --config=drizzle.config.ts && gulp DB:addMeta && npx drizzle-kit generate:pg --config=drizzle.config.ts
scripts.DB:checkMigration: npx tsc --noEmit && gulp DB:checkSchemaAndRefreshTestDataFiles && npx drizzle-kit check:pg --config=drizzle.config.ts
scripts.DB:refreshTestData: npx tsc --noEmit && gulp DB:checkSchemaAndRefreshTestDataFiles && gulp DB:refreshTestData
